name: A Call For Help
description:
Hold the line x3
  1. Protect the phone (prevent enemies from destroying it)
  2. Stay on the phone (prevent enemies from touching you)
  3. Hold the phone (your movement is limited by the phone's cord)

Move with Arrow Keys / WASD / ZQSD / IJKL
Shoot with Mouse

Made for DevAtlas Jam - March
Theme: HOLD THE LINE
